scripts.start: npm run replica && dfx generate dao && npm run test-proposals && npm run serve
scripts.replica: dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && npm run create-canisters && npm run deploy && npm run mint
scripts.create-canisters: npm run create:dao && npm run create:btcflower && npm run create:ethflower && npm run create:icpflower
scripts.deploy: npm run build-power-equalizer && npm run deploy:dao && npm run deploy:btcflower && npm run deploy:ethflower && npm run deploy:icpflower
scripts.deploy:dao: DFX_MOC_PATH="$(vessel bin)/moc" dfx build dao && dfx generate dao && dfx deploy dao --argument '(true, vec {principal "zvkal-dnnsd-syh57-zvwzw-3aa6g-nt4vz-2ncib-dqfd4-oaisq-xhv6y-eae"})' --mode reinstall --yes
scripts.deploy:btcflower: dfx deploy btcflower --argument "$(cat btcflower-initArgs.did)" --mode reinstall --yes && dfx canister call btcflower initMint && dfx canister call btcflower shuffleTokensForSale && dfx canister call btcflower airdropTokens && dfx canister call btcflower enableSale
scripts.deploy:ethflower: dfx deploy ethflower --argument "$(cat ethflower-initArgs.did)" --mode reinstall --yes && dfx canister call ethflower initMint && dfx canister call ethflower shuffleTokensForSale && dfx canister call ethflower airdropTokens && dfx canister call ethflower enableSale
scripts.deploy:icpflower: dfx deploy icpflower --argument "$(cat icpflower-initArgs.did)" --mode reinstall --yes && dfx canister call icpflower initMint && dfx canister call icpflower shuffleTokensForSale && dfx canister call icpflower airdropTokens && dfx canister call icpflower enableSale
scripts.deploy-ic: DFX_MOC_PATH="$(vessel bin)/moc" dfx deploy dao --network ic --argument '(false, vec {principal "zvkal-dnnsd-syh57-zvwzw-3aa6g-nt4vz-2ncib-dqfd4-oaisq-xhv6y-eae";})' && dfx deploy assets --network ic
scripts.upgrade: . ./set-env.zsh && dfx canister create dao && dfx build dao && dfx generate dao && dfx canister stop dao && dfx canister install dao --argument '(true, vec {principal "zvkal-dnnsd-syh57-zvwzw-3aa6g-nt4vz-2ncib-dqfd4-oaisq-xhv6y-eae"})' --upgrade-unchanged --mode=upgrade dao && dfx canister start dao
